SCHOOL

Quality and relevant education for San Joseños remains a top priority of the San Jose Del Monte City government in order to prepare the youth to become morally-upright citizens, produce world-class and globally competent manpower, and promote the historical and cultural heritage of the city. This is why the city government established the City College of San Jose Del Monte or CCSJDM.

City College of San Jose Del Monte is an institution that will facilitate access to the professional, technological and continuing education of San Joseños, particularly the under privileged and the financially disadvantaged to uplift their quality of life.

read more

Developers

Made for school project of CCSJDMSHS TVL-ICT 11 A group 4 students. Lead junior front-end developer Jerald Anthoni Olin A. Pascual takes on full heights writing code for 2nd semester's final project, along with the open-source contributions.

Explore

Programs

Explore a world of academic excellence at CCSJDM! From senior high school to college levels, we offer diverse programs aimed at reshaping education and transforming lives. Committed to providing transformative education, we strive to make a difference, hone values, and develop capabilities. Join us in our journey of empowering minds and shaping futures.
